1.title: Subject Settings: Change Texts
1.body:
Change "Subjects in the Analysis Test" to "Subject Settings"
Change "Subject Id" to "Subject ID"

1.title: Attribute Settings: Change "Format Description" to "Attribute ID"
"Default Analysis Preferences" Layout
1.body:
Top Row should be:
"Significant Attribute Indicator" "Max Attributes per Chart" "Chart Scale Type"

Bottom Row should be:
"Attribute PCA Matrix" "Product PCA Matrix"

1.title: Change "PCA PLOT",  "PCA PLOT CHART", & "PCA GRAPH" to "PCA CHART"
1.body:
"ATTRIBUTE PCA PLOT" on CHARTS
"EXPORT PCA PLOT CHART" on CHARTS > ATTRIBUTE PCA PLOT
 "PCA GRAPH" on CHARTS > CUSTOM CHARTS > Attribute
"Attribute PCA Graph" in EXPORTED Worksheet

1.title: Change "Create Worksheet" to "Create Canvas"
1.body:
DESCRIPTIVE ANALYSIS > CHARTS > CUSTOM CHARTS > +ADD NEW CANVAS > PRODUCT:

Change "Create Worksheet" to "Create Canvas"

1.title: RjAdmin edit and create company users
1.body:
* verify other companies with company coordinate cannot update a user from another company. Add the check for the RedJade Coordinator claim - or - Company Coordinate and company membership
* move user create and update into MVC
* add links to rj admin to edit and create user for a given company

1.title: Additional user statuses
1.body:
Give better statuses and integration with the user account information for the following scenarios:

* If a user is changing his email, show this as the status.
* an inactivate button that works when a user is still pending
* an activate button for inactivate users
* delete for pending users

milestone.title: 1.1 Maintainable Muckraker
milestone.description:
A maintainability release for DA that will attempt to do the minimum possible to get the current system maintainable so we can move on to a proof of concept on data collections.

Tentative, broad objectives:
* database migrations
* unify conventions
* define modules
* deployment script for automatic publication to multiple test environments
* better testing for bugs found after 1.0
* any maintenance issues from release that are sucking time

1.title: Site Scrolling Issue
1.body:
The site will not scroll to the bottom 100px because the top-nav is throwing off the height of the internal scroll.  I have reproduced the issue here.

http://jsbin.com/URiTopab/4/edit

*I had to temporarily rollback the table layout because it did not work in IE.  This may be related.

1.title: Unassign Licensee does not decrement Assigned number until screen is refreshed.
1.body: Admin > LICENSES > LICENSEES: When User is Unassigned, the number shown for Assigned is not reduced until screen is refreshed.

1.title: Empty "Notes" Field on License Produces "null" in License Tile
1.body: If the Notes field is left empty when a License is set up, the word "null" is displayed on the Admin > LICENSES > ASSIGNMENT License Tile.

1.title: Create New User: Change "passcode" to "password".
1.body:
Change header:
"Newly created users will be notified by email to set up their passcode."
to
"Newly created users will be notified by email to set up their password."

1.title: Search Users, Projects, or Analyses Does Not Work If Apostrophe Entered First
Add Canvas Save As Option
1.body: Under the add canvas menu add an option to "Save As" which will make a copy of the current canvas and prompt the user for a new canvas name

1.title: Admin: Edit User Email -> Server Error
Mandrill Email Address
1.body: I would like to remove the "Sent on Behalf" portion of the email address, if this is not possible should we move it to our Exchange server?

1.title: Reporting Requests
1.body:
1) I would like to have a dashboard screen showing currently logged in users, I would prefer to display this within the RedJade Admin interface rather than the google Analytics
2) I would also like to be able to generate a report for activity within a given time period for projects and analyses created for all users sorted by Account and user.

1.title: Project & Analysis Search Field
1.body: Currently the search field searches for matching strings at the beginning of the Project or Analysis name, the search should be if Project or Analysis name "Contains" the phrase typed

1.title: Not So Critical Charting Issues
1.body:
1) The horizontal line separating the center pane header is not lined up properly with the fade transition
2) If I select to change the type of chart in the center pane, when I hover the mouse over the drop down selections the scroll bar for the center pane disappears and some stuff shifts right except the drop down, looks odd, nothing should shift, scroll should not disappear
3) when the All Product & All Attributes (or any of the templates) is created a horizontal bar chart is created by default for a single attribute in a group, it should be a vertical bar chart as we don't have a selection for a horizontal bar chart
4) On the PCA chart we had the ability to click on an attribute or product in the chart and that would turn it red, this feature no longer works (it does work from selecting on the right pane though)
5) Attribute Filter not working properly, for Analysis #3143 we have 18 attributes that end in AP, if I tell the application to show me all the attributes that end in AP it does not return the last two (ChocolateAmt2AP and CaramelStretchAP), is the filter set to return 16 at the most?
6) If you select the "Products" template the button that on the pop up that creates the canvas is labeled "Create Worksheet" and should be labeled "Create Canvas"
7) When a new Custom Canvas is added the program should set focus to the first chart of the new canvas

1.title: PCA Recalculation: Check for minimum number of Attributes and minimum number of Products
Create New Analysis
1.body: When I create a new analysis from within a project the focus should set on the Analysis Name field

1.title: Subject Preferences
1.body: When the excluded field is toggled the subject's Unique ID field displays the term "null"

1.title: Import Problem
1.body: 1) Remove Special Characters From The End checkbox causes the import to fail when selected

1.title: RedJade Descriptive Analysis User Guide needs replacement

2.title: UI Enhancements
2.body:
Carried over from Issue #125.

Organize analysis settings, color-coding, defaults, & details into fewer pages that make more sense.

2.title: Need Ability to Edit License Qty under RedJade Admin

3.title: Exclude All Attributes in a Group should not display empty chart.
3.body: Excluding all Attributes with same Region & Modality (OAp) yields an empty chart.  Empty chart should not be included on Canvas.

3.title: Company Admin -> Licenses -> Assignement Scrolling Issue
3.body: When a license is selected the scroll does not display the full bottom row,
